channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- ADAudit Plus
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- ADAudit Plus

item.title: CVE-2024-5487|2024-08-12T07:06:13.604Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8110 are vulnerable to authenticated SQL Injection in attack surface analyzer's export option.

item.title: CVE-2024-36518|2024-08-12T07:13:49.843Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8110 are vulnerable to authenticated SQL Injection in attack surface analyzer's dashboard.

item.title: CVE-2024-36035|2024-08-12T07:19:54.491Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8003 are vulnerable to authenticated SQL Injection in user session recording.

item.title: CVE-2024-36034|2024-08-12T07:23:17.212Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 8003 are vulnerable to authenticated SQL Injection in aggregate reports' search option.

item.title: CVE-2023-49334|2024-08-02T21:53:45.017Z -- manageengine -- adaudit%20plus
item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL Injection while exporting a full summary report.

item.description: Zoho ManageEngine ADAudit Plus versions below 7271 allows SQL Injection while getting aggregate report data.
